about_the_game:
"Shadow Of Sound" - a traditional 4k drop-down music game.

Out of my love for music and interest in programming, I made this game. This is also the first project I developed using the cocos2d-x game engine. I hope you like it!

Game features:



The gameplay is simple and only requires 4 buttons.

Different difficulties, there is always one suitable for you.

Completely free, now and in the future.

A lot of beautiful music that I like.

Moreover, this is an open source project, everyone is welcome to learn and continue to develop!

Immerse yourself in the world of Shadow Of Sound together!
